item.title: Rsc Landscape Editing programs
item.dc:creator: @nm98c nm98c
item.description:
@nm98c wrote:

[quote=“Artemis Wp, post:5, topic:530309”][quote author=nm98c link=topic=649067.msg4363412#msg4363412 date=1379192247]

Anyone have any experience with areaEditor?

I do with landscape editor. Well im not a pro but good enought why ?

I glanced at landscape editor but i dont like that it’s 2d. My problem with area editor is I can’t figure out how to make East walls, roofs, or diagonal walls. There’s no option menu for them. I tried tons of keys on my computer too but nothing seems to manipulate the wall texture into anything except north textures.

Hope that makes sense. All wall textures can only be places north, I can’t manipulate them to go any other direction. Was just hoping to find someone with a bit of experience with the program that might know what to do.

Thanks

Nm
[/quote]

Why don’t u use landscape editor to add walls only ?[/quote]

Yeah I guess that might be my only option. I just figured somebody might know a way to do it on areaeditor.

But for now thanks for the suggestion. I just added the walls i needed on landscape editor. Can always just use area editor for manipulating the height and layout of the land then adding buildings with landscape editor.

Takes a bit longer with saving and moving files back and forth but ill make it work for now.

Thanks man.

I figured out how to do diagonal walls etc. when in editing mode of that particular item, scroll and it will change the orientation of the object.

Only thing I do not know now is how to do roofs with area editor. I can use landscape editor to add and remove roofs if necessary. That wouldnt be as big of a deal.

Any help would be appreciated

Thanks!

Read full topic
